title: Parametric Generative Schemes with Geometric Constraints for Encoding and Synthesizing Airfoils. (arXiv:2205.02458v2 [physics.flu-dyn] UPDATED)

tldr: 本文提出了两种基于深度学习的生成方案，可在满足特定约束的情况下有效地生成机翼型，其中软约束方案直接训练几何约束作为网络的一部分，硬约束方案则使用变分自动编码器和自由变形基技术生成并投影机翼型。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes two deep learning-based generative schemes to effectively generate airfoils while satisfying specific constraints, including a soft-constrained scheme that trains geometric constraints as part of the network and a hard-constrained scheme that uses a VAE-based model and an FFD-based technique to generate and project airfoils. The reconstructed airfoils are both accurate and smooth, and the soft-constrained scheme generates airfoils that converge to the given constraints despite slight deviations.
